Products

Mayonnaise(4)

Mayonnaise "Tarplan"
Ingredients: water, vegetable oil, thickener (modified starch, guar gum and xanthan gum), sugar, milk protein, salt 1,0%, mustard flour, cooking vinegar, flavouring, preservative (potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate), food colour (beta-carotene).
Content of nutrients per 100 g of the product: proteins 0,72 g; carbohydrates 6,14 g; fats 27.2 g.
Energy: 1123,0 kJ (272,2 kcal) /100g.
Package: bottles of 900 grams.
Mayonnaise Lahe Laua
Ingredients: water, vegetable oil, thickener (modified potato starch, xanthan gum), sugar, egg powder, whey powder, salt 1,3%, mustard flour, cooking vinegar, citric acid, preservative (sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate), food colour (beta-carotene).
Content of nutrients per 100 g of the product: proteins 0,9 g; carbohydrates 5,5 g; fats 35,6 g.
Energy: 1426,0 kJ (346,0 kcal) /100g.
Package: bottles of 450 and 900 grams; additionally mayonnaise buckets of 4,5 and 9 kg for catering kitchens.
Mayonnaise Provansaal
Ingredients: vegetable oil, water, sugar, whey powder, egg powder, salt 1,1%, , thickener (modified starch, xanthan gum), mustard flour, cooking vinegar, citric acid, preservative (sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate), food colour (beta-carotene).
Content of nutrients per 100 g of the product: proteins 0,92 g; carbohydrates 4,97 g; fats 50,13 g.
Energy: 1954,9 kJ (474,7 kcal) /100g.
Package: bottles and cups of 900- , 450-, 430-, and 230 grams; additionally mayonnaise buckets of 4,5 and 9kg for catering kitchens.
Mayonnaise-ketchup sauce
Ingredients: water, vegetable oil, tomato paste, sugar, thickener (modified starch, guar gum and xanthan gum), cooking vinegar, skimmed milk powder, egg powder, mustard flour, salt 1,2%, wine vinegar, spice (milled clove), aromatiser, strengthener of taste and aroma (sodium glutamate), preservatives (potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate).
Content of nutrients per 100 g of the product: proteins 1,5 g; carbohydrates 9 g; fats 27 g.
Energy: 1177,5 kJ (285,0 kcal) /100g.
Package: bottles of 450 grams.
